#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#define ll long
using namespace std;
ll adj[100001];
int dfs(ll x,ll y)
{
	ll k=x,t=y;
	while(1)
	{
		if(adj[k]==y)
		{
			return 1;
			break;
		}
		if(adj[k]==-1)
		{
			return 0;
			break;
		}
		k=adj[k];
	}
}
int main()
{
	ll n,m,u,x,y;
	scanf("%ld %ld",&n,&m);
	scanf("%ld",&u);
	for(ll i=0;i<=100000;i++)
	{
		adj[i]=-1;
	}
	n--;
	while(n--)
	{
		scanf("%ld %ld",&x,&y);
		adj[y]=x;
	}
	while(m--)
	{
		scanf("%ld %ld",&x,&y);
		int f=0;
		f=dfs(x,y);
		if(f==1)
		{
			printf("1\n");
		}
		else
		{
			f=dfs(y,x);
			if(f==1)
			{
				printf("-1\n");
			}
		}
		if(f==0)
		{
			printf("0\n");
		}
	}
}
